 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּהְָלָה‎</span> **noun feminine** ==error== (? si vera lectio; √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תהל‎</span> according to [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>Lex. Aeth. 522</sup>, who compare Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> III. ***rove, wander***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***commit error***, compare [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>NB § 179. Anm. 3</sup>); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּבְמַלְאָכָיו יָשִׂים ת‎</span> [[Job.14.18|Job 14:18]], &lt; read  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּפְלָה‎</span> q. v. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּהִלָּה‎</span> see II.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הלל‎</span>. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּהֲלוּכָה‎</span>] see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הלך‎</span>.
